content.heading: 1. Introduction
content.body: Welcome to my portfolio. Your privacy is of the utmost importance. This policy details what personal data is collected and how it is used.

content.heading: 2. Data We Collect
content.body: For the visitor widget, we collect anonymous geolocation data through public APIs (IP-API, Open-Meteo) to personalize the experience. For the newsletter subscription, we use Supabase Auth, which may involve the use of cookies to manage your session. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
